anime.description: A boy encounters a trace of his lost father on tracks where time comes and goes, at a station where time stops. With the help of a mysterious projectionist, the boy and station master search for the truth of the father`s image. ---- Director/Script/Production: Tayuta Mikage Producer: Tom Nagae Music Producer: Tohru Okada Sound Producer: Kazuhiko Arakawa Sound Effects: Sinnosuke Sato Co-production: Directions, Inc. http://www.daf-tokyo.jp/test4/prg-animation-en.html http://www.dep.sme.co.jp/tayutau/
